channel.title: Timeline Explorer on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline Explorer on Analyst

item.title: ⏱️ Timelines And Timestamps
item.description: As if investigations were not already complicated enough, we also have to contend with various timestamp formats. There is a wide range of time formats available, and it is crucial to understand the differences in order to create an accurate timeline.

item.title: Case 4. Compromised Apache Server
item.description: Compromised Apache Web server with drupal application used for local team. There was some unusual activity noticed between 05/10 and 08/10/19.
